en-US.Error_CardNumber_Pattern: Please enter a valid 16 digit Card number.
en-US.Error_CardNumber_Invalid: Debit Card Number is invalid or Card not active.
en-US.Error_ExpiryMonth_Invalid: Please enter a valid Expiry Month.
en-US.Error_ExpiryFields: Please select a valid Expiry field
en-US.Error_ExpiryMonth_MaxLength: Month should not be more than be 2 digit
en-US.Error_ExpiryYear_Invalid: Please enter a valid Expiry Year.
en-US.Error_ExpiryYear_MaxLength: Year should not be more than be 2 digit
en-US.Error_OldAPIN_Pattern: Please enter a valid Debit Card PIN.
en-US.Error_OldAPIN_Length: Debit Card PIN should be 4 digits.
en-US.Error_NewAPIN_Pattern: Please enter a valid Debit Card PIN.
en-US.Error_NewAPIN_Length: Debit Card PIN should be 4 digits.
en-US.Error_ConfirmAPIN_Pattern: Please enter a valid Debit Card PIN.
en-US.Error_ConfirmAPIN_NotMatch: Oops. The reconfirm did not reconfirm.
en-US.Error_ConfirmAPIN_NotMatch1: Please enter the same PIN in both boxes.
en-US.Tip_CardNumber: Please enter your 16 digit debit card number
en-US.Tip_Expiry: Please enter  the expiry date as it appears on your debit card
en-US.Tip_CVV: Please enter the 3 digit CVV number you will find on the back of your card
en-US.Tip_OldAPIN: Please enter your Old debit card PIN
en-US.Tip_CardNo: Please select your 16 digit debit card number
en-US.Tip_NewAPIN: Please provide your new Debit Card PIN
en-US.Tip_ConfirmAPIN: Please confirm your Debit Card PIN
en-US.Tip_Old_Password: This is the password used to login to Internet Banking and Mobile Banking
en-US.Success_Msg: Your PIN is now changed. What do you want to do next?
en-US.Tip_OTP: Please enter the 6 digit OTP we sent to your registered mobile number
en-US.Tip_Password: Your password should be 6-15 characters, with atleast one number.
en-US.Error_Invalid_Max_Length_PWD: Password should not be greater than 15 Characters
en-US.Error_Password_Length: Password length should be in between 6 to 15 characters only
en-US.Error_Password_Pattern: Your password should be minimum 6 and maximum 15 characters.
en-US.Error_Password_Pattern1: It should have at least 1 number.
en-US.Password_Changed1: Your password has now been changed.Please use the same password to login to internet banking.
